shortcv.p: Mr. Vasileios Zeimpekis holds an BEng(Hons) in Telecommunications Engineering from the University of Essex, (UK). He has also been awarded with an MSc in Mobile and Satellite Communications from the University of Surrey (UK) and an MSc with Distinction in Engineering Business Management from the University of Warwick (UK). Mr. Zeimpekis is currently studying towards his PhD in the Department of Management Science and Technology at the Athens University of Economics and Business (GR). He is also a Research Officer in ELTRUN/WRC, where he is involved as a project manager or lead researcher in several European and National research projects. His interests focus on Supply Chain Management (Transportation Management, Urban distribution, Vehicle Routing Systems) as well as Mobile/Wireless and Satellite Communications (GIS, Positioning systems, Mobile/wireless systems and technology).
Mr. Zeimpekis is Member of the Technical Chamber of Greece, of the Institute of Electrical Engineers (IEE), of the Hellenic Management Association and of the Institute of Operations Management.
